entry.def: A speaker or writer uses we to refer both to himself or herself and to one or more other people as a group. You can use we before a noun to make it clear which group of people you are referring to.
entry.tran: (包括说话者或笔者在内的)我们

example.ex: We both swore we'd be friends ever after...

example.ex: We ordered another bottle of champagne...

entry.def: We is sometimes used to refer to people in general.

example.ex: We need to take care of our bodies.
